attributes.action: Give the English a say on Scottish and Welsh independence Do we want them to go?
attributes.additional_details: Give the English a voice to tell you how we feel?
attributes.background: Start an English independence referendum. We the English people keep hearing the Scottish and Welsh wanting independence from UK. What if the English want them to have independence? They can then fund their own free prescriptions and no tuition fees instead of the ENGLISH tax payer?
